channel.title: Architecture on stultus notes
channel.description: Recent content in Architecture on stultus notes

item.title: Analytical Data
item.description: Data that helps humans make better decisions.

item.title: Analytically Operational Data
item.description: Data that automatically helps someone make better decisions.

item.title: Architecturally-significant Requirement (ASR)
item.description: A requirement that measurably influences a software system’s architecture.

item.title: Architecture Decision (AD)
item.description: A software design choice that addresses an architecturally-significant requirement.

item.title: Architecture Decision Log (ADL)
item.description: A collection of all Architecture Decision Records for a project or organization.

item.title: ELT (Extract - Load - Transform)
item.description: Data processing approach where raw data is loaded before transformation, preserving original data.

item.title: Operational Data
item.description: Data whose purpose is to remember things.

item.title: Phantom Urbanism
item.description: Buildings built as financial instruments, unlived in, massive in scale.

item.title: Pretty Good House
item.description: Ideas for building a pretty good house.
